TopicTitle: OS-Independent: Advanced Grabbing Unit (AGU) don't dock with Asteroid

Articles.Content:
Hi out there Kerboids.

Since some days i have a problem with not docking my Asteroid-Catcher to a very small Asteroid. (Think its Class E.)

I am quite "sure" it happen/came in after updating some mods in CKAN. (Ship Manifest, Heat Management,

 Contract Configurator, Modular Fuel Tanks and some more.)

I arm the Grapplings but it moves through the surface of the Ast. (PVU-261).

Tried it with targeting the Asteroid in Kerbal Engineer, with manually selecting

and with "Select Center of Mass".

Maybe he is too small (?), maybe i do some other unknown mistake.. ?

Maybe my mod installations gone broken?

Any Ideas, practices or hints about that?

Red Greetings from Duna,

Jansky
